title: Bug 104397JDBC Data Set Editor showing empty/system schemas
description: Bug 104397JDBC Data Set Editor showing empty/system schemas This is a regressionagainst 1.0.0 Final.See attached screenshot for an example. We need to preserve that behavior.
OB: Some recent enhancements to the JDBC Data Set Editor in 1.0.1 dev build hasintroduced an unintended side effect: the Schema browser now shows empty and/orsystem schemas, which are never used to build queries. Note that the "Available Items" pane shows a large number of empty andsystem schema names (APP, SYS, SYSCAT, etc.). Previously with 1.0.0 Final build,only the "CLASSICMODELS" schema is shown.
SR: This is shown when creating a Sample DBdata set.
